name: mailboxlayer-plugin
description: Get email scores for PostHog users using the Mailboxlayer API.

config.hint: This can be a Restricted API key and only needs read access to Customers, Subscriptions, Plans, Usage Records, and Invoices.
config.name: Your Stripe API key

config.hint: Selecting 'Yes' will capture only new customers, while 'No' will always pull and update **all** your Stripe customers.
config.name: Only register new customers?
